DOC.brief_summary: To validate accuracy reading noninvasive blood pressure ( NIBP ) module sphygmomanometer per requirement AAMI SP10:2002 . This study adult pediatric population .
DOC.brief_title: Larsen & Toubro ( L & T ) Noninvasive Blood Pressure Module Performance Validation
DOC.criteria: Subjects : Healthy volunteer Healthy subject Age 1 60 yr Both gender Consenting study Subjects suffer cardiorespiratory , neurological endocrinal disorder Subjects alcohol abuse/dependance Female subject pregnant lactate Subjects pace maker implantation Subjects : Diseased subject Patients hypertensive , ICU patient different disease Age 1 80 yr Both gender Consenting study Healthy volunteer
